article: Every child has his own dream.Every child hopes to be an adult.  _  , is it really like what they imagine? As a boy  _  lives in modern times and in a modern city,I feel great pressure on me  _  the city's development.Although we  _  worry about money, we still have some  other  problems, such as competition among classmates and expectation from parents.These experiences are thought to be very  _  to our future.But  in fact  ,they really give me a lot of pressure.I still clearly  _  the happiness of my childhood.  _  ,we had to face the fact with time passing by.We began to  _  this invisible pressure come upon us.We get up before sunrise and  come back  after sunset.We work and study  _  an adult, even harder.  _  we do is in order to get an excellent  _  .Growing up is very boring,but we should try to find happiness while growing up.I think  _  among our friends,the support from our parents and the encouragement from our teachers can help us.Why not enjoy the pleasure of growing up and its delicious taste?
